Package demoreee

Class OppPlayer

java.lang.Object
demoreee.Character
demoreee.OppPlayer
public class OppPlayer
extends Character
The OppPlayer class draws the in game character animations and implements some game mechanisms.

  • Constructor Details

    • OppPlayer

      public OppPlayer​(java.lang.String name, javafx.scene.layout.Pane gameRoot, java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.image.ImageView> levelPlayers, java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.Node> levelPickups, int startX, int startY, int width, int height)
      A function that constructs the human player which the user controls. It follows specific movement rules. It can only move left, right or jump. It is affected by gravity.
      Parameters:
      name - - The name of the player.
      gameRoot - - The gameRoot which links the entity and its shape and coordinates to the map.
      startX - - The start position given by the X coordinate.
      startY - - The start position given by the Y coordinate.
      width - - the width of the robot entity.
      height - - the height of the robot entity.
